rules_text:
Draw three cards. You lose 3 life.
Proliferate [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]Phyrexia can provide many gifts. Join the great work and forget your impure past. The great work has begun and will continue until all worlds know blessed perfection.
—Sheoldred, Blighted Thane[/i]
